title: Mid-term Examination Schedule
subtitle: Important Update
description: The mid-term examinations will commence from next week. Please check your respective examination schedules. All students are required to bring their ID cards and hall tickets.

title: Library Maintenance Notice
subtitle: Service Interruption
description: The central library will be undergoing maintenance work this weekend. All services will be temporarily unavailable. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

title: Sports Day Event
subtitle: Annual Sports Meet
description: The annual sports day will be held next month. All students are encouraged to participate. Registration forms are available at the sports department.

title: Fee Payment Deadline
subtitle: Important Reminder
description: This is a reminder that the last date for fee payment is approaching. Please ensure timely payment to avoid any late fees.

title: Career Fair 2024
subtitle: Opportunity for Students
description: The annual career fair will be held next month. Various companies will be participating. Bring your updated resumes.

title: Hostel Rules Update
subtitle: New Guidelines
description: Please note the updated hostel rules. Curfew timing has been changed to 10 PM. All students must follow the new guidelines.

title: Scholarship Application
subtitle: Merit-based Awards
description: Applications for the merit-based scholarship are now open. Last date to apply is next month.

title: Cultural Fest Registration
subtitle: Annual Cultural Festival
description: Registration for the annual cultural festival is now open. Various competitions and events will be organized.

title: Campus WiFi Upgrade
subtitle: Network Maintenance
description: The campus WiFi network will be upgraded this weekend. Services may be intermittent during the maintenance period.

title: Research Paper Submission
subtitle: Conference Deadline
description: Last date for research paper submission for the annual conference is approaching. Please submit your papers before the deadline.

title: Guest Lecture Series
subtitle: Industry Experts
description: A series of guest lectures by industry experts will be conducted next week. All students are encouraged to attend.

title: Campus Cleanup Drive
subtitle: Environmental Initiative
description: Join us for the monthly campus cleanup drive. All volunteers will receive certificates of participation.

title: Student Council Elections
subtitle: Voting Day
description: Student council elections will be held tomorrow. All students are requested to cast their votes.

title: Cafeteria Menu Update
subtitle: New Food Options
description: The cafeteria menu has been updated with new healthy food options. Check out the new additions.

title: Workshop on AI
subtitle: Technology Session
description: A workshop on Artificial Intelligence will be conducted next week. Limited seats available.

title: Library Book Sale
subtitle: Annual Clearance
description: The annual library book sale will be held this weekend. Great discounts on various books.

title: Health Checkup Camp
subtitle: Free Medical Camp
description: A free health checkup camp will be organized next week. All students are encouraged to participate.
